name: The Great Gatsby: Classic Adventures Full
name_original: The Great Gatsby: Classic Adventures Full
description: "The Great Gatsby: Classic Adventures" is a unique Hidden Object Adventure game that takes you through the classic literary novel, "The Great Gatsby" by F. Scott Fitzgerald. You'll experience moving hidden object scenes, puzzles, and a typing game that feels as though you are at the author's desk. After finishing the game go through and replay any part of the story or game play. You'll earn trophies and decorate your library as you embark on this adventurous story of love, jealousy, and tragedy!
